sentence: The apartment complex boasts a fitness facility with state-of-the-art exercise equipment.
The attic was transformed into a cozy reading nook with a view of the neighborhood.
The spacious loft apartment featured high ceilings and an open floor plan.
Enjoying morning coffee on the balcony became a daily ritual for the residents.
The basement served as a multifunctional space, housing a home theater and a workout area.
The modern bathroom is equipped with a shower, bathtub, and elegant fixtures.
The spacious bedroom featured a comfortable bed and ample storage for clothing.
The cellar was used for storing wine and as a cool retreat during hot summer days.
The well-lit corridor provided access to various rooms on the same floor.

meaning: n. 大厅；休息室；会客室；游说议员的团体
sentence: The hotel lobby featured stylish furniture, creating a welcoming atmosphere for guests.
The porch served as a charming entryway, adorned with potted plants and comfortable seating.
The grand foyer of the mansion was adorned with a crystal chandelier and elegant furnishings.
The apartment complex had a peaceful courtyard with benches and lush greenery.
The formal dining room was furnished with an elegant table and chairs for hosting dinner parties.
The high-rise building was equipped with a reliable elevator for residents' convenience.
The lift in the building ensured easy access to all floors for residents with mobility challenges.

meaning: n. 自动扶梯；电动扶梯
sentence: The shopping mall featured escalators for convenient access between different levels.
A wooden fence surrounded the backyard, providing privacy for outdoor activities.
The charming footbridge over the stream added a picturesque touch to the garden.
The central courtyard boasted a beautiful fountain as its focal point.
The spacious garage accommodated two cars and provided additional storage space.
The well-maintained garden featured a variety of flowers, shrubs, and a winding stone pathway.
The backyard was adorned with a flourishing lemon tree, providing fresh fruit for the residents.
The modern kitchen was equipped with stainless steel appliances and ample counter space.
The built-in oven made baking and cooking a breeze for the home chef.
The laundry room featured a washer, dryer, and a folding area for added convenience.
The cozy lounge area was furnished with plush sofas and served as a communal space for residents.
The rooftop terrace provided stunning views of the city skyline.
The modern bathroom included a spacious shower with both rainfall and handheld options.
The luxurious bathtub was a relaxing retreat after a long day.
The sheer curtains allowed natural light to filter into the living room, creating a bright and airy atmosphere.
The hotel offered comfortable single rooms for solo travelers.
The bed and breakfast provided cozy double rooms for couples or friends traveling together.
The hotel suite featured a twin room configuration, perfect for siblings or friends.
The hostel offered budget-friendly shared rooms with communal facilities.
The storeroom in the basement served as a place to store seasonal items and household supplies.
The large storehouse on the property stored agricultural equipment and supplies.
The industrial warehouse was used for storing inventory and shipping goods.
The spacious study room featured a large desk and bookshelves, providing a quiet space for focused work.
The community complex had a sparkling swimming pool for residents to enjoy on hot summer days.
The kiddie area included a paddling pool for young children to splash and play safely.
The guest toilet on the main floor was tastefully decorated with modern fixtures.
The monthly rent for the apartment included utilities and access to the building's amenities.
The rental price for the vacation cottage varied depending on the season and length of stay.
Negotiating a bargain on the rent was possible for long-term tenants.

meaning: n. 极大，最大限度；最大量
sentence: The maximum occupancy for the conference room was set at 50 people.
The minimum rental period for the vacation home was one week.
The landlord required a security deposit to cover any potential damages during the lease period.
Signing a rental contract is a standard practice to clarify terms and conditions between landlords and tenants.
An agreement was reached regarding the maintenance responsibilities between the building management and residents.

meaning: n. [法]广告；账单;[金融] 票据；钞票；清单
sentence: The monthly utility bill included charges for electricity, water, and gas.
The apartment was equipped with energy-efficient appliances to reduce electricity consumption.
Conserving water by fixing leaks and using water-saving appliances was encouraged in the building.

meaning: n. 气体；[矿业] 瓦斯；汽油
sentence: The kitchen stove and heating system were powered by natural gas for efficient energy use.

meaning: n. [热] 加热；[建] 供暖；暖气设备
sentence: The central heating system kept the entire building warm during the winter months.
Residents were informed of the laundry fee for using the communal laundry facilities.
High-speed internet access was included in the monthly rent for the apartment.
